nodes.text: Lo was a male child who lived on an unknown world and was to be taken to Coruscant by Jedi Master Yoda to begin his Jedi training. Before the Jedi could collect him, Lo was imprisoned by the Flesh Mongers pirate group led by Alorg in their lair on the planet Botor. After arriving on Botor, Yoda briefly skirmished with the pirates whilst collecting the child. Shortly after Qui-Gon Jinn and his padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi arrived on the planet and were tasked by Yoda with taking Lo to Coruscant.
